channel.title: How do you create shops?
channel.description: Ok, i know how to create a shop, the only thing I don't know is.. If you make a shop... then it's just a shop... and witch NPC will you click on to access the shop, thats my problem )=. I don't know how to access the shop, like connect it with a spawned NPC so that if i trade it, the shop comes up.. How do i do this. And please do not say "Wanneshop" that will not help me... just give me a discription. Thanks

item.title: How do you create shops?
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

Ok, i know how to create a shop, the only thing I don’t know is… If you make a shop… then it’s just a shop… and witch NPC will you click on to access the shop, thats my problem )=. I don’t know how to access the shop, like connect it with a spawned NPC so that if i trade it, the shop comes up… How do i do this. And please do not say “Wanneshop” that will not help me… just give me a discription. Thanks
